title: Chicken Vesuvio
ingredients: 2 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
ingr: 2 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
prep: Place chicken pieces in a roasting pan.
Add olive oil, garlic, and potatoes.
Add wine and chicken stock, roast another 30 minutes.
Add peas, parsley, and oregano, cook 5 minutes longer.
